summary: Three young men decide to plan a mock kidnapping, but everything goes wrong because a real bank robbery was already planned by two other guys.
cast: Steve Alden|David Arquette|Stephen Baldwin|Jonah Blechman|Michael Edelstein|Jeff Gardner|Tom Hull|J. Michael Hunter|Sammy Kershaw|Sheryl Lee|Jason London|Richard K. Olsen|Amy Parrish|Mickey Rourke|John Henry Scott|Paul Skemp|Emily Wachtel|Suellen Yates
title: Tiempo para morir
